labels.shortDescription: Error when trying use non-publish method on Event SObjectTypes.
labels.value: SObject type {0} must use registerPublishBeforeTransaction or registerPublishAfterTransaction methods to be used within this unit of work

labels.shortDescription: Error when the provided externalIdField is not an external Id.
labels.value: Invalid argument: externalIdField. Field supplied is not a marked as an External Identifier.

labels.shortDescription: Error when the provided externalIdField is not available on the SObjectType.
labels.value: Invalid argument: externalIdField. Field supplied is not a known field on the target sObject.

labels.shortDescription: Error when relatedToField argument is null.
labels.value: Invalid argument: relatedToField.

labels.shortDescription: Error when relatedToField argument is not a relationship field.
labels.value: Invalid argument: relatedToField. Field supplied is not a relationship field.

labels.shortDescription: Error when trying to add new records for deletion.
labels.value: New records cannot be registered for deletion

labels.shortDescription: Error when trying to add new records as dirty.
labels.value: New records cannot be registered as dirty

labels.shortDescription: Error when trying use publish method with a non-Event SObjectType.
labels.value: SObject type {0} is invalid for publishing within this unit of work

labels.shortDescription: Error when adding records of a not supported SObjectType to the UnitOfWork.
labels.value: SObject type {0} is not supported by this unit of work

labels.shortDescription: Error when adding existing records as new.
labels.value: Only new records can be registered

labels.shortDescription: Error when adding records of different SObjectTypes.
labels.value: All records should be of the same SObjectType

labels.shortDescription: Error when selecting a cross-object fieldsset is not allowed and attempted.
labels.value: Cross-object fields not allowed and field "{0}" is a cross-object field.

labels.shortDescription: Error when selecting a field set for a different sobject type.
labels.value: Field set "{0}" is not for SObject type "{1}"

labels.shortDescription: Presented when attempting to nest subqueries.
labels.value: Invalid call to subselectQuery. You may not add a subselect query to a subselect query.

labels.shortDescription: Presented when attempting to create a subquery from an invalid relationship.
labels.value: Invalid call to subselectQuery. Invalid relationship for table.

labels.value: You do not have permission to insert field {1} on {0}

labels.value: You do not have permission to insert {0}
